nodes.title: Fix mixins. Fix Spookium Material. Name ServerWorld properly.
Large refactor to the code. Do not merge until other currently existing PRs are merged.
Fix the gitignore to ignore gradle-wrapper.properties.
New candies and loot table based trick or treating
Re-revert Gradle with better performance + silence mixin warning at build
Mobs in the halloween spirit - 2nd attempt
Custom biome source and biome layers
A basic, early implementation of the spooky dimension.
Update the .gitignore to ignore gradle, idea, and vscode files.
Add Mod Menu dependency to build.gradle
Add a custom underwater fog system, add water vaporization config options.
Add sapling to cutout layer. Fix saplings not generating trees properly.
fix infusion recipe, add libcd support
Replace PumpkinFoods class with Item Tag
Completed French translation & hallowed infested blocks change
Fix a crash, add placeholder logo
Fix double MC version in CF sources jar display name
Add a survival method to get to The Hallow
Updated Trinkets and fixed pumpkin ring behavior
Placeable pumpkin pies & updated fr translation
Dimension Improvements, Texture Changes, and Server Crash Fixes
Stone circle tweaks and loot chest 1/3 of time therein
Add method descriptors to the various mixins.
Make the dimension textures spookier as well as fix up server compat.
Deadwood Trees and lots of other goodies
Stone circles and otherwise improved uplands generation
Add missing Fluid Blocks to fix error with mod not compiling.
Water bug fix for #127. Yes it's 2 lines long
Add Infusion system (Infusion Altar & Infusion Pillar)
actually use the varargs stuff for the recipes
Witch wells and edible tiny pumpkins
Peppermint, Blood Red Dying, Cleanup and assorted things
Implement Blood Fluid. Improve Tainted Sandstone textures.
I'm about to do what's called an authoritarian move.
Add Beheading, Lifesteal, and update PT-BR translations.
Witch Water Improvements and Tainted Sandstone
Implements Witch Water based entirely on Issue #68.
Update Trinkets to fix crash and added pumpkin stew
Clean up the dimension code a slight bit.
Enable the sky, time, and pumpkin spawns in the dimension. Also switches all blocks to show up in the spooky tab.
